EmailTemplate.subject: Live Different Academy: Update Email
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Happy start-of-May everyone!
I am so excited for all of you to join us soon in August as we start a brand new adventure together.
This is a very informative email so please read everything and if you have any questions, feel free to contact me.
1. BIOS OF GRADUATING ACADEMY STUDENTS
Here are the Bios for all of our Academy students that are graduating this year by click on this link and selecting the "Bios" tab: http://livedifferent.com/academy
2. TUITION/PAYMENT
Here is your payment breakdown: $7,995 - Tuition Total
$300 - Initial Deposit, upon registration (which has been received) $2,000 - June 30, 2013 (your next payment) $2,000 - August 18, 2013 $3,695 - January 20, 2014
You are welcome to pay tuition in full at the beginning of the year (August 18, 2013), but we allow for the payments to be split up between the first and second semester. If you intend to raise funds as a volunteer for Live Different (as an Academy, you are considered a volunteer. 3. BURSARY
To help cover your tuition, then you are eligible for our $300 bursary.
Here is a link to the bursary application: http://livedifferent.com/sites/default/files/pdf/Academy_bursary2013.pdf. The $300 bursary would be applied to your second semester so that your second payment would be $3,395.
4. FLIGHTS/ARRIVAL
Please book your flights to and from the Hamilton International Airport
Airport Code: YHM Arrival: August 18th, 2013 Departure: December 21st, 2013
5. SCHEDULE
Term 1:
August 18th: Students arrive in Hamilton August 19th: Orientation Day August 20th-30th - Leadership Training and Road/Mexico Team Orientation (Depending on what team you are on in Term 1) September 3rd - December 21st - Road Life/Mexico Life December 21st - Christmas Break!
6. PHOTOS, BLOGS AND UPDATES
Please check out our Live Different Facebook page to see what our current Academy students are up to. It will help you prepare for your year with us! https://www.facebook.com/pages/Live-Different/189864944417296?ref=hl
7. FACEBOOK PRIVATE PAGE
We have a private facebook page for all Academy students to get to know each other and stay informed before our semester begins. If you have not already been added to the group, please contact me as soon as possible so I can add you in.
8. PERSONAL STORY
Please start to think of what has happened in your life that you would like to share during our motivational presentations. Christal will be working on it with you guys closer to our semester to prepare you for tour.
9. FORMS TO READ AND SIGN
Presentation Letter - A great tool for fund raising. Present this letter to potential donors and business when looking for donations to help with your fundraising goal. It gives an explanation of who Live Different is and what the Live Different Academy is all about. It is a good idea to include a personal letter from yourself too. One that explains why you want to participant in the program and what you hope to accomplish. Payment-Donation Form - any donations (ie. cheques) you receive from others MUST be accompanied by one of these forms in order to establish whether they are making a payment or giving a donation. An explanation of each option is clearly outlined on the form. Please print several copies of the attached form, or send people to the following online link: http://livedifferent.com/sites/default/files/pdf/Academy_payment.pdf Housing Application - This application needs to be filled out and sent to office with an additional $200 deposit. Your deposit will be returned to you at the end of your school term if all housing regulations and rooms left in the condition of the beginning of the school year. Child Protection Policy - This is for all our Live Different Academy students to read. It is our policy on what is appropriate behaviour when dealing with minors and the steps that we take to protect them. It is important that you take the time to read this beginning to end. Child Protection Policy Agreement - Once you have read the above Child Protection Policy, please sign the agreement and send it in with your next payment. Criminal Record Check (through mybackcheck) - If you are 18 years of age as of January 1st, 2013, you will be required to obtain a criminal record check. Please obtain one through the email link I will send you.
10. STUDENT HANDBOOK
You will be receiving your Student Handbook in the spring, along with packing lists. We will not be making the decision regarding who goes to Mexico first and who tours with the motivational production until June, as the decision is based largely on the number or students and the strengths/personalities of the students accepted to the Academy. Thank you in advance for your patience.
Please feel free to call or email me at any time go over more information with you and to answer any questions that you or your parents may have about the Academy. I am always available to you at the contact information below. Please do not be shy in calling or emailing; if you don't know, just ask. I'm here to help.
Sincerely, Joy Yu
